name: src/builder.js
builder
description: Use `builder` to create instances of AgentBuilder.
examples:
<caption>create an Agent with an mbox.</caption>
let builder = AgentBuilder.builder();
builder = builder.withEmail("nandita@example.gov");
console.log(builder.build());

params.name: value
params.description: A plain javascript Agent or Group.

return.description: A builder for xAPI Agents and Groups.

name: withEmail
description: Add an `mbox` based on an email

params.name: email
params.description: Email to use for the Agent/Group `mbox` property

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withName
description: Add a personal or descriptive name for this Agent or Group

params.name: name
params.description: Name to use for the Agent/Group `name` property.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withHomePage
description: Add the `homePage` URL of an `account`

params.name: homePage
params.description:
URL to use for the Agent/Group `account`
`homePage` property

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withAccountName
description:
Add the `name` identifier of an `account`. This is a unique identifier
the system identified by `homePage` links to a particular account.

params.name: name
params.description:
Name to use for the Agent/Group `account` `name`
property.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: asGroup
description: Makes this create a Group (AgentBuilder makes Agents by default).

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withMember
description: Adds an Agent as a `member`. Makes this a Group if it isn't already.

params.name: agent
params.description:
Another AgentBuilder or a plain Javascript object
representing a complete Agent, to add to the `member` property.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withMbox
description: Identify this with an `mbox` (must start with `mailto:`!)

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withMbox_sha1sum
description: Identify this with an `mbox_sha1sum`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withOpenid
description: Identify this with an `openid`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withAccount
description: Identify this with an `account`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: builder
description: Use `builder` to create instances of ActivityBuilder.

return.description: A builder for xAPI Activities.

name: withId
description:
Set the Activity `id`

If the `id` is not a URI but matches a name of an Activity in a Profile
loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the `id` of that Activity will
be used. Throws an error if the `id` does not match a name and is not
uri-like.

params.name: id
params.description:
URI to set the `id` to or name of an Activity from
a Profile.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withType
description:
Set the Activity `type`

If the `type` is not a URI but matches a name of an Activity Type in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the uri of that
Activity Type will be used. Throws an error if the `type` does not match
a name and is not uri-like.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withExtension
description:
Add an extension to the Activity definition

If the `key` is not a URI but matches a name of an Activity Extension in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the uri of that
Activity Extension will be used. Throws an error if the `key` does not
match a name and is not uri-like.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withMoreInfo
description: Add a `moreInfo` URL

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withInteractionType
description: Add an `interactionType`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withCorrectResponsesPattern
description: Add possible `correctResponsesPattern` values

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withChoices
description: Add available `choices` for this interaction

params.name: choices
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withScale
description: Add `scale` values for this interaction

params.name: scale
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withSource
description: Add available `source` values for this interaction

params.name: source
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withTarget
description: Add available `target` values for this interaction

params.name: target
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withSteps
description: Add available `steps` for this interaction

params.name: steps
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withName
description: Add a `name` for this Activity in a particular `language`

params.name: name
params.description: the name of this Activity in that language.

params.name: language
params.description:
an RFC 5646 language tag, such as `en` or
`zh-Hans`.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withDefinition
description: Add a `definition` for this activity in a particular `language`

params.name: definition
params.description:
the definition of this Activity in that
language.

params.name: language
params.description:
an RFC 5646 language tag, such as `en` or
`zh-Hans`.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withUsageType
description:
Provide a `usageType` uri

If the `uri` is not a URI but matches a name of an Attachment Usage Type
in a Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the uri of
that Attachment Usage Type will be used. Throws an error if the `uri`
does not match a name and is not uri-like.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withContentType
description:
Provide a `contentType` for the attachment, also called a media type or
MIME type

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withLength
description: Provide a `length` for the attachment in octets

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withSha2
description:
Provide a `sha2` for the attachment

This is the hexadecimal value of a hash from the SHA-2 family of hashes,
with a bit-length of 224, 256, 384, or 512.

params.name: sha2
params.description: the attachment SHA-2 hash in hex

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withFileUrl
description:
Provide a `fileUrl` where this attachment can be accessed

The fileUrl does not need to public, but should be as accessible as
possible.

params.name: fileUrl
params.description: a URL to retrieve the attachment from.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withDisplay
description: Add a `display` for this attachment in a particular `language`

params.name: display
params.description:
a short display value for this Attachment in that
language.

params.name: language
params.description:
an RFC 5646 language tag, such as `en` or
`zh-Hans`.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withDescription
description: Add a `description` for this attachment in a particular `language`

params.name: description
params.description:
a description for this Attachment in that
language.

params.name: language
params.description:
an RFC 5646 language tag, such as `en` or
`zh-Hans`.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withProfile
description:
Add an xAPI Profile to enable referring to terms by name instead of URI
with later API calls.

params.name: profile
params.description: a complete xAPI Profile as a JSON object.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withVerb
description:
Add the `verb` for the Statement

If the `verb` is not a verb object or a URI but matches a name of a Verb
in a Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the complete
Profile representation of that verb will be used. Throws an error if the
`verb` does not match a name and is not uri-like or an object with an
`id`. If a URI is provided will also attempt to load the complete
Profile representation.

params.name: verb
params.description: the verb URI, name or object.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withVerbDisplay
description: Add the `verb` `display` for a particular `language`

params.name: language
params.description:
an RFC 5646 language tag, such as `en` or
`zh-Hans`.

params.name: display
params.description:
a short display value for the verb in that
language.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withObject
description:
Add the `object` for the Statement

There are several possible ways to provide the `object`:
  * As the UUID `id` of a Statement. The `object` will be set to a
StatementRef with that `id`.
  * As a name or URI of an Activity. If the Activity is found in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the complete
Profile representation of that Activity will be used. Throws an error
if a name does not match an Activity and is not uri-like.
  * As a builder from this library for an Agent, Group, or Activity.
  * As a {@link StatementBuilder}, which will be used as a SubStatement
according to the rules from the xAPI specification.
  * as a complete simple javascript object of an Activity, Agent, Group,
StatementRef, or SubStatement.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withAttachment
description: Add an attachment to the Statement

params.name: attachment
params.description:
an AttachmentBuilder or simple javascript
object of an attachment.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withContextStatement
description:
Add a `context` `statement` as a StatementRef

Accepts a StatementBuilder object, a simple javascript Statement or
StatementRef object, or the uuid `id` of the Statement referred to.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withId
description: Add the `id` for the Statement

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withTimestamp
description: Add the ISO 8601 `timestamp` the Statement occurred

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withCurrentTimestamp
description: Set the Statement as occurring at the current time.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withStored
description: Add the ISO 8601 `stored` time for the Statement

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withVersion
description: Add the xAPI `version` of the Statement

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withScaledScore
description:
Add a score scaled to between -1 and 1 (inclusive) for the Statement

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withRawScore
description: Add a raw score for the Statement `result`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withMinScore
description: Add a minimum score bound (inclusive) for the raw score.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withMaxScore
description: Add a maximum score bound (inclusive) for the raw score.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withSuccess
description: Add a boolean `success` for the Statement `result`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: asSucceeded
description: Mark the Statement `result` as succeeding

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: asFailed
description: Mark the Statement `result` as failing

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withCompletion
description: Add a boolean `completion` for the Statement `result`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: asComplete
description: Mark the Statement `result` as complete

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: asIncomplete
description: Mark the Statement `result` as incomplete

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withResponse
description: Add a `response` for the Statement `result`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withDuration
description: Add an ISO 8601 `duration` for the Statement `result`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withRegistration
description: Add a `registration` for the Statement `context`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withRevision
description: Add a `revision` for the Statement `context`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withPlatform
description: Add a `platform` for the Statement `context`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withLanguage
description: Add a `language` for the Statement `context`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withCurrentLanguage
description: TODO document

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withActor
description:
Add the `actor` for the Statement

There are two ways to provide the agent:
  * As a AgentBuilder from this library.
  * as a complete simple javascript object of an Agent or Group.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withAuthority
description:
Add the `authority` for the Statement

There are two ways to provide the agent:
  * As a AgentBuilder from this library.
  * as a complete simple javascript object of an Agent or Group.

returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withInstructor

returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withTeam
description:
Add the `team` to the `context` for the Statement

returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withObjectId
description:
Set an Activity `object` `id`

If the `id` is not a URI but matches a name of an Activity in a Profile
loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the `id` of that Activity will
be used. Throws an error if the `id` does not match a name and is not
uri-like.

params.name: id
params.description:
URI to set the `id` to or name of an Activity from
a Profile.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectType
description:
Set the Activity `object` `type`

If the `type` is not a URI but matches a name of an Activity Type in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the uri of that
Activity Type will be used. Throws an error if the `type` does not match
a name and is not uri-like.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectExtension
description:
Add an extension to the Activity `object` `definition`

If the `key` is not a URI but matches a name of an Activity Extension in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the uri of that
Activity Extension will be used. Throws an error if the `key` does not
match a name and is not uri-like.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectMoreInfo
description: Add a `moreInfo` URL to an Activity `object`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectInteractionType
description: Add an `interactionType` to an Activity `object`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectCorrectResponsesPattern
description: Add possible `correctResponsesPattern` values to an Activity `object`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectChoices
description: Add available `choices` for this interaction to an Activity `object`

params.name: choices
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectScale
description: Add `scale` values for this interaction to an Activity `object`

params.name: scale
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectSource
description: Add available `source` values for this interaction to an Activity `object`

params.name: source
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectTarget
description: Add available `target` values for this interaction to an Activity `object`

params.name: target
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectSteps
description: Add available `steps` for this interaction to an Activity `object`

params.name: steps
params.description:
interaction components with string `id`
and language map `description`

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectDefinition
description: Add a `definition` for this Activity `object` in a particular `language`

params.name: definition
params.description:
the definition of this Activity in that
language.

params.name: language
params.description:
an RFC 5646 language tag, such as `en` or
`zh-Hans`.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withObjectName
description:
Add a name for the `object` -- a personal or descriptive name
for an Agent or Group, or the name of an Activity in a `language`

params.name: name
params.description:
The language-specific name for an Activity or the
Agent/Group name.

params.name: language
params.description:
an RFC 5646 language tag, such as `en` or
`zh-Hans`. Only use for Activity objects.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withContextCategory
description:
Add an Activity to the `category` `contextActivities` in `context`

There are several possible ways to provide the Activity:
  * As a name or URI of an Activity. If the Activity is found in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the complete
Profile representation of that Activity will be used. Throws an error
if a name does not match an Activity and is not uri-like.
  * As a builder from this library for an Activity.
  * as a complete simple javascript object of an Activity.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withContextParent
description:
Add an Activity to the `parent` `contextActivities` in `context`

There are several possible ways to provide the Activity:
  * As a name or URI of an Activity. If the Activity is found in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the complete
Profile representation of that Activity will be used. Throws an error
if a name does not match an Activity and is not uri-like.
  * As a builder from this library for an Activity.
  * as a complete simple javascript object of an Activity.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withContextGrouping
description:
Add an Activity to the `grouping` `contextActivities` in `context`

There are several possible ways to provide the Activity:
  * As a name or URI of an Activity. If the Activity is found in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the complete
Profile representation of that Activity will be used. Throws an error
if a name does not match an Activity and is not uri-like.
  * As a builder from this library for an Activity.
  * as a complete simple javascript object of an Activity.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withContextOther
description:
Add an Activity to the `other` `contextActivities` in `context`

There are several possible ways to provide the Activity:
  * As a name or URI of an Activity. If the Activity is found in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the complete
Profile representation of that Activity will be used. Throws an error
if a name does not match an Activity and is not uri-like.
  * As a builder from this library for an Activity.
  * as a complete simple javascript object of an Activity.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: withContextExtension
description:
Add an extension to the `context`

If the `key` is not a URI but matches a name of a Context Extension in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the uri of that
Context Extension will be used. Throws an error if the `key` does not
match a name and is not uri-like.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: withResultExtension
description:
Add an extension to the `result`

If the `key` is not a URI but matches a name of a Result Extension in a
Profile loaded by {@link StatementBuilder#withProfile}, the uri of that
Result Extension will be used. Throws an error if the `key` does not
match a name and is not uri-like.

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The original
is unmodified.

name: asSubStatement
description:
Makes this create a SubStatement (StatementBuilder makes Statements by
default).

return.description:
returns the updated builder object. The
original is unmodified.

name: activities
description:
An ActivityBuilder derived from this StatementBuilder, knowing about
all the same Profiles.

name: agents
description:
An AgentBuilder derived from this StatementBuilder, knowing about
all the same Profiles.

name: attachments
description:
An AttachmentBuilder derived from this StatementBuilder, knowing about
all the same Profiles.

name: src/oracle.js

content:
{
  "name": "xapi-statement-builder",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "A library for constructing Experience API Statements",
  "main": "dist/xapi-statement-builder.js",
  "module": "src/index.js",
  "author": "Russell Duhon <fugu13@gmail.com>",
  "license": "Apache-2.0",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack",
    "test": "mocha --compilers js:babel-register"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.0",
    "babel-register": "^6.24.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.2",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jsverify": "^0.8.2",
    "mocha": "^3.5.0",
    "webpack": "^3.5.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "immutable": "^3.8.1",
    "lodash": "^4.17.4"
  }
}
name: package.json
